settings.title: Stay up to date on the latest offers from Sonno

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more â€¦

settings.title: High Quality Mattresses
settings.text: Mattress can be used by anyone, The mattress will help keep the critical parts of your body supported allowing you to sleep in perfect harmony.

settings.title: Best Designer Beds
settings.text: Our beds will make a stunning addition to your bedroom with its clean cut design. It is available in a range of colours and sizes to suit any bedroom.

settings.title: Fast FREE Delivery
settings.text: & Hassle free returns

settings.title: Our Heritage
settings.subtitle:
How It Started
Sonno.co.uk is a family run business based in Yorkshire. For over 20 years, weâ€™ve been creating welcoming spaces for a good nightâ€™s sleep in hotels, universities and commercial properties, and weâ€™re not stopping there.

How Itâ€™s Going
How you wind down and wake up is important to us. We now provide hand-made, made to order beds and mattresses designed for modern homes, to help you drift off to sleep in comfort. Enjoy quality homeware that meets the highest possible standards and is kind to your wallet too.

settings.title: SLEEP SPECIALISTS, AT YOUR SERVICE
settings.text:
We wake up every day, eager to understand how to improve your sleep. We are dedicated to offering high quality solutions for modern living. These values are reflected in our hand-made, custom order approach, which puts you at the center of all we do.

Our beds and mattresses are a blend of both form and function. Hand-crafted from quality materials with outstanding style, you can fill your space with everything you need for peace and relaxation.

settings.title: Our Services
settings.content: Your home is a source of pride and your bedroom is precious. Whether youâ€™re furnishing your first home or upgrading your furniture, we make transforming your bedroom into a sanctuary seamless.

settings.title: Custom Made Beds
settings.text: We create made to order, hand-made beds for better bedrooms and better sleep. With plenty of options to choose from, you can pick the exact features you want and create the bed of your dreams.
settings.text1:
Our courier will deliver your items direct to your doorstep.

We also provide grouped delivery. When you buy several products from us, we group your order so all your items arrive on the same day.Â

settings.title: AND WEâ€™RE JUST A PHONE CALL AWAY
settings.content: From a question about your order to our top three all-time comfiest mattresses, if thereâ€™s anything youâ€™d like to talk about, just give us a call onÂ 01924 926117.

settings.title: Get in touch
settings.subtitle: Subheading

settings.title: Who is Klarna?
settings.subtitle: Klarna is a Swedish payment service provider that takes end-to-end responsibility for your payment. Klarna is the provider of smooth payments to more than 200,000 online stores. Over 85 million consumers worldwide have trusted Klarna to securely handle their payments.

settings.title: How does Pay later in 30 days work?
settings.subtitle:
Once your order is confirmed, you'll receive an email with payment instructions within two days from Klarna. You'll then have 30 days to try on your order and only pay when youâ€™re happy. Complete the payment online, at your convenience, with no extra cost. You can pay via credit or debit card in Klarna.app or by logging intoÂ www.klarna.com/uk.

Am I eligible for Pay later in 30 days?
To use Pay later in 30 days you must be at least 18. Whilst this option is widely promoted, Pay later in 30 days is subject to your financial circumstances. When choosing Pay later in 30 days, our assessment will not affect your credit rating.

How can I increase my chances of being accepted for Pay later in 30 days?
Klarna is unique and offers Pay later in 30 days based on a number of factors such as the order value, previous order history and item availability. If you are 18 or over, you can improve your chances of being offered Pay later in 30 days by ensuring you provide your full name and accurate address details and shipping to your registered billing address. All orders are assessed individually. Just because you have had Pay later in 30 days before does not mean it will be offered for every order and in turn, as it is denied does not mean it will be denied for all future orders.

settings.title: Will a credit search take place against me?
settings.subtitle:
Klarna may run so-called unrecorded enquiries (or soft credit searches) that do not affect credit scoring and are only visible to you and Klarna, but not visible to other lenders. Neither Klarna nor Sonno run credit searches against you that could impact your credit rating.

Why have I not been offered Pay later in 30 days?
Although Pay later in 30 days is widely promoted it is not always universally available. The Pay later in 30 days method is automatically generated by algorithms that are dependent upon a number of factors including amount of order, the online store, previous order history and item availability. Alternatively, you are able to complete your order by paying by credit or debit card at the checkout.

What happens if I donâ€™t pay for my order?
Payment is due 30 days after the item is shipped. To help you pay on time, we'll alert you two days before payment is due â€“ you'll receive a push notification from the Klarna app or email reminders to pay â€“ and, if very late, weâ€™ll also send you a text or letter, too. Your credit score will not be impacted by using Klarnaâ€™s â€˜Pay later in 30 daysâ€™ products even if you have failed to pay on time.

settings.title: What information do I need to provide when I make a safe purchase using Klarna?
settings.subtitle:
If you want to make a purchase with Klarna you need to provide your name, address and email address. For some orders you may need to provide your mobile number or date of birth, too. All information will be sent to your email address, including payment reminders and links to your online statements. It's very important that you give us the correct details, as otherwise you will not receive the payment information.

Payment information is processed securely by Klarna. No card details are transferred to or held by Sonno. All transactions take place via connections secured with the latest industry standard security protocols.

In order to be able to offer you Klarnaâ€™s payment options, we will pass to Klarna certain aspects of your personal information, such as contact and order details, in order for Klarna to assess whether you qualify for their payment options and to tailor the payment options for you.

General information on Klarna you can findÂ here. Your personal data is handled in accordance with applicable data protection law and in accordance with the information inÂ Klarnaâ€™s privacy policy.

You can also review our privacy policyÂ here.

settings.title: Can I pay before the due date?
settings.subtitle:
You can pay for your order at any point after you receive the email from Klarna with the details of your payment on. Just follow the instructions on this email or in the Klarna app to pay for your order.

Have you received my payment?
If you pay by card, Sonno will confirm your order right away. If paying by Pay later in 30 days, Klarna will send you a payment confirmation to the email address that you have used for your order. If you have made a payment but not received the payment confirmation, you can always check the status of your order and payments by logging in to the Klarna app orÂ www.klarna.com/uk.

settings.title: How does the return process work?
settings.subtitle:
Once Sonno has received the return (partial or full) and you have received their confirmation of this, an updated statement will be sent to you by Klarna if you've made a partial return. With a full return, your statement will be closed. You are always able to monitor the status of your order in the Klarna app.

What happens if I cancel or return my order?
As soon as Sonno have accepted your cancellation/return, then Klarna will cancel the statement or refund your payment. The return will be reflected in the Klarna app immediately.

I have cancelled my order. How long will it take until I receive my refund?
As soon as the store has registered your cancellation or your return, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.

settings.title: I've received a statement, but I've not yet received my goods.
settings.subtitle: You have 30 days to pay, so you donâ€™t need to pay right away. If your due date is near and there is no sign of your goods, please call Sonno to check on delivery. You can also contact Klarnaâ€™s Customer Service so that we can postpone the due date on your payment or put the order on hold in the Klarna app while you wait for the goods to arrive. If you do not have your statement number to hand you can log into the Klarna app or atÂ www.klarna.com/uk,Â where you will find all of your orders and be able to make payments.

settings.title: I have asked for a refund. How will I be refunded?
settings.subtitle: If you have paid for your order with a card, the refund will be made back to the same card. If you have not paid the statement yet, then the refund will reduce the statement or cancel it completely.

settings.title: I still have questions regarding payment, how can I get in touch?
settings.subtitle: Visit Klarna appÂ Klarnaâ€™s Customer Service pageÂ for a full list of FAQâ€™s, live chat and telephone options: Local Rate: 020 300 50833 / Freephone: 0808 189 3333.

settings.title: Page FAQ Template
settings.subtitle: Create an amazing FAQ page with a full-width banner

settings.heading: WHAT, WHY, HOW?
settings.title: So, What's Klarna?
settings.text:
Need a new bed or mattress? Klarna gives you the chance to try before you buy. Shop now but pay later. Just selectÂ â€˜Pay Later with Klarnaâ€™ at the checkout!

-30 days to pay

-No account sign up needed

-You must be 18.

-No credit application

-Klarna emails payment instructions straight to you
settings.text1: Youâ€™ve got the chance to try your product before you even pay for it. If you like what you have received simply pay for it after 30 days. No interest, no fees! (If paid within 30 days).

settings.title: The Klarna Checklist
settings.text: It's simple. All you need to use Klarna is...
settings.text1:
-You must be at least 18 years old

-A UK bank account

-A UK residential address

Great, lets get shopping!

settings.custom_html:
HOW TO USE IT?

1

Find something you wannaâ€™ buy from F4H. Add it to your basket and head over to the checkout.

2

Click â€˜Pay Later with Klarna' at the checkout - no need to create an account.

3

Place your order and this will be despatched as normal.

4

Youâ€™ll receive an email with instructions on how to pay.

settings.content: Questions?Â For all those concerning the product, delivery and returns, please contact support@sonno.co.uk. For all those concerning payment or regarding an expected refund, please contact Klarna. For more details, see the FAQ section below.

settings.title: WHAT, WHY, HOW?
settings.content: Need a new bed or mattress but can't pay in full? The with Klarna you have the chance to Pay in 3!

settings.title: WHAT'S Pay in 3?
settings.content: You can now spread the cost of your purchase over 3 equal payments. The payment for each instalment will automatically be collected from the debit or credit card you entered at checkout. Your first instalment will be collected when your order is confirmed by Sonno and instalments 2 and 3 are scheduled 30 and 60 days later, respectively.

settings.title: WHY YOU NEED IT...
settings.text:
- Spread the cost over 3 equal payments

- Will not affect your credit rating
settings.text1:
1Â  Find something you want to buy from Sonno. Add it to your basket and head over to the checkout.

2Â  You must have sufficient funds available on your credit or debit card for the first payment at the time of ordering

3Â  SelectÂ â€˜Pay in 3â€™Â at the checkout.

4Â  Place your order and this will be dispatched as normal.

5Â  Pay in 3 equal payments â€“ first when you place the order, second 30 days later and third 60 days later.

settings.title: THE PAY IN 3 CHECKLIST
settings.text: Itâ€™s simple. All you need to use Pay in 3 is...
settings.text1:
To be 18 years or over

A valid mobile number and email address

A UK residential address

A UK bank account with good credit history

A credit/debit card to be valid for 60 days from purchase date

Great, lets get shopping!

settings.content: Questions?Â For all those concerning the product, delivery and returns, please contact support@sonno.co.uk. For all those concerning payment or regarding an expected refund, please contact Klarna. For more details, see the FAQ section below.
